DOC.brief_summary: In present study , 4-week sleep coaching program develop evaluated member German arm Forces . The aim program provide efficient tool prevent sleep disorder , improve mild sleep disorder , special focus insomnia .
DOC.detailed_description: In present study , sleep-coaching program small group maximum eight participant develop . The program comprise four different session provide member German arm force . One session last approximately 1.5 hour session apply weekly basis . Each session deal different topic , address major category sleep disorder ( insomnia , hypersomnia , circadian rhythm disorder , sleep-related breathing disorder ) teach way self-help information seek medical treatment . The program evaluate cross-over study design treatment wait control group . After treatment group finish course , wait group attend sleep coaching session . All subject fill sleep log several questionnaire prior ( t0 ) treatment group finish sleep coach ( t1 ) , wait group finish course ( t2 ) , 3-month follow-up session ( t3 ) . Furthermore , sleep record accord AASM-standard criterion two consecutive night time-points t0 , t1 , t2 . Subjective objective sleep quality compare across time-points , group . In total , least 48 participant include study .
DOC.criteria: subjectively impaired sleep quality member German arm force subject clinically relevant psychiatric decease able give inform consent
